1.name: Scholar's Den Uptown
1.description: Scholar's Den Uptown is a 24/7 study library designed for serious learners. We provide a peaceful and focused environment with modern amenities to help you achieve your academic goals.

seatingOptions.name: Private Cabin
seatingOptions.description: Fully enclosed private cabin with premium desk space and storage.

seatingOptions.name: Semi-Private
seatingOptions.description: Semi-private workspace with partition walls.

seatingOptions.name: Shared Desk
seatingOptions.description: Shared workspace in quiet study hall.

rules: Maintain complete silence in study areas
No outside food in premium cabins
Clean and sanitize your workspace after use
No phone calls in silent zones

2.description: The Reading Room Central offers a spacious study environment with flexible seating options and modern facilities for both group and solo learners.

seatingOptions.name: Private Cabin

seatingOptions.name: Semi-Private
seatingOptions.description: Partitioned semi-private seating.

seatingOptions.name: Shared Desk

rules: Food allowed only in designated areas
Maintain decorum during group discussions
Do not move furniture without permission

7.description: Focus Lounge Library offers a minimalist yet highly effective study environment. Designed to keep distractions away, it’s perfect for students preparing for competitive exams.

seatingOptions.name: Private Cabin

seatingOptions.name: Semi-Private
